Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Commerce[ENDCOLOR] provides bonuses to empires focused on [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Commerce allows you to earn Great Merchants 25% faster. Unlocks building Big Ben.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all Policies in the Commerce tree will grant you 2 free Great Merchants, and double the amount of [ICON_GOLD] Gold and [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence gained from Great Merchant Trade Missions. It also provides +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from Customs Houses and allows the purchase of Great Merchants with [ICON_PEACE] Faith starting in the Industrial Era.
